name: A. Two Groups
statement:
You are given an array a consisting of n integers. You want to
distribute these n integers into two groups s_1 and s_2 (groups can be
empty) so that the following conditions are satisfied: For each i (1
leq i
leq n), a_i goes into exactly one group. The value |sum(s_1)| -
|sum(s_2)| is the maximum possible among all such ways to distribute the
integers.Here sum(s_1) denotes the sum of the numbers in the group s_1,
and sum(s_2) denotes the sum of the numbers in the group s_2.Determine
the maximum possible value of |sum(s_1)| - |sum(s_2)|.
